entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as the teacher of Divination. She is described as having seated herself in a winged armchair in front of the fire.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students who sat around the round table. He is not described further in this context.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students who sat around the round table. He is not described further in this context.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the students who sat around the round table. She is not described further in this context.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney is the teacher of Divination, and Harry is one of her students.
Professor Trelawney is the teacher of Divination, and Ron is one of her students.
Professor Trelawney is the teacher of Divination, and Hermione is one of her students.
